Header: Houses given to flood victims in Kotapola
Content: A housing scheme launched on behalf of several families who faced grave hardships due to last yearâ€™s floods in the Kotapola area has been declared open. The opening took place under the patronage of Minister Sagala Ratnayake. These houses have been built in the Ilukpitiya area at Kotapola in Matara. The houses were vested in the people amidst the chanting of Seth Pirith by members of the Maha Sangha. Dialog Axiata Company contributed to the construction of these houses which were vested in the public by Minister Sagala Ratnayake. Money was also collected from Dialog customers. Army officials who contributed for the successful completion of the housing scheme were acclaimed. The Minister handed over gifts to them. The housing scheme is complete with pipe borne water, electricity, road and other infrastructure.
